question: Determine the length of Line_C_A in the figure.
qt_description: Line Line_C_A (Description: Connect points C and A (both on segments))
description:
原始图形描述: Base shape is a regular 6-sided polygon (center O1) with side length 5, rotation angle pi/6 radians. Total 1 derivation rounds. Round 1: applying 'concentric' rule. Concentric derivation: 6-sided polygon (center O1) scaled by 1/2. Found 13 total points (including intersections). Geometry finalized: 0 new lines and 0 new arcs generated by splitting. Total lines: 12, total arcs: 0, total points: 13.
增强操作总轮数: 1
第 1 轮操作（共 1 步）:
  第 1 步: Connect points C and A (both on segments)
api_results: A regular hexagon with center O₁ and side length 5 is rotated by π/6 radians. A concentric, scaled-down hexagon (scale factor 1/2) is inscribed within it, sharing the same center O₁. Points A and C lie on the outer hexagon’s perimeter, specifically on adjacent sides, and are connected by a straight line segment. Determine the length of segment CA.
